item.title: Crashes when it loads
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Your system specs seem to be OK (and, BTW, THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR POSTING THEM WITHOUT ADDITIONAL REQUEST - YOU REALLY ROCK!) for the game.
It might be that something went wrong with your savegame due to some unknown reason. Had you tried starting up a new game from the latest chapter you had unlocked so far?

Read full topic
